  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(TypeStages TypeStage, Calendar startDatePlanned, Calendar endDatePlanned, Calendar startDateReal, Calendar endDateReal, boolean statusStage)
      The constructor for the stage class
      Parameters:
      TypeStage - Type of the stage (e.g. planning, execution, monitoring, evaluation)
      startDatePlanned - Planned start date for the stage
      endDatePlanned - Planned end date for the stage
      startDateReal - Real start date for the stage
      endDateReal - Real end date for the stage
      statusStage - Status of the stage (true if completed, false if not completed)

    • registerCapsule

      public boolean registerCapsule(String id, String description, String type, String colabName, String jobTitle, String lessonLearned)
      Method that registers a new capsule with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the capsule
      description - the description of the capsule
      type - the type of the capsule (Technical or Experiences)
      colabName - The collaborator name
      jobTitle - the position of the collaborator
      lessonLearned - the lesson learned from the capsule
      Returns:
      true if the capsule is successfully registered, false otherwise

    • approveCapsule

      public boolean approveCapsule(String id, String status)
      Aprobar una cÃ¡psula existente.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the capsule to be updated.
      status - The new status to be set for the capsule (either "approved" or "not approved").
      Returns:
      True if the capsule was found and the status was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • searchCapsule

      public String searchCapsule()
      Returns a string with a list of all the capsule IDs in the system.
      Returns:
      A string with the list of capsule IDs.

    • getCapsule

      public String getCapsule()
      Returns a string with a list of all the capsules in the system, including their properties.
      Returns:
      A string with the list of capsules and their properties.

    • searchCapsuleByHashtags

      public String searchCapsuleByHashtags(String hashtagToSearch)

    • editStage

      public boolean editStage(int stageOption, int dateSP, int monthSP, int yearSP, int dateSR, int monthSR, int yearSR)
      Edits a project stage by setting its planned and real start dates.
      Parameters:
      stageOption - The index of the stage to be edited.
      dateSP - The day of the planned start date.
      monthSP - The month of the planned start date
      yearSP - The year of the planned start date.
      dateSR - The day of the real start date.
      monthSR - The month of the real start date.
      yearSR - The year of the real start date.
      Returns:
      True if the stage was edited successfully, false otherwise.

    • gLessons

      public String gLessons()
      Retrieves the lessons learned in all the capsules of the project stage.
      Returns:
      A string with the lessons learned in all the capsules of the project stage.
